oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fiftieth anniversary convocation program
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Weems, Dean A.; Cope, Quill E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Middle Tennessee State College Chorus, performer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Program and accompanying audio clips from a special convocation held in commemoration of the fiftieth anniversary of the founding of the Middle Tennessee State Normal School

Audio clips: 1. Recollections of the first day of classes (Weems) -- 2. Political maneuverings bring the school to Murfreesboro (Cope) -- 3. Old and new Alma Maters are performed (Cope/Middle Tennessee State College Chorus).
